conversation_history.content: Hello! Welcome to the Employment Verification System. Let's start by collecting some information. What is your full name?
Nice to meet you, I! How many years of experience do you have?
I have been having totally 5.2 years of experience
Great! What is your date of birth? Please say it in a format like day, month, year.
Thank you, I! Now, please provide your email address so I can check our records.
I couldn't find any employment records for logesh@askgalore.com. Could you please tell me your current company name?
I found some possible matches: 1: IoT Innovations Ltd, 2: Global Solutions Ltd. Please say the number of your company, or say your company name if it's not listed.
Thank you! I've recorded your company as No 1. Your verification is complete, I!
You're so welcome, I! Thank you, and have a wonderful day ahead!
